TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorTypeConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ExpandableObjectConverter

summary.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

span.span: Provides type converters for converting objects to and from objects of other types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta clase también contiene métodos para escribir en él un para un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] paquete y leer una desde una [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] paquete que se proporciona una cadena que representa el [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] de la .This class also has methods for writing a to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] package and reading a from an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_metro](~/includes/tla2sharptla-metro-md.md)] package that is given a string that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] of the . Vea las clases base y para notas importantes de utilización.See the base classes and for important usage notes.
